verses.verse: Now the <S%H5029>prophets,<s%> <S%H2292>Haggai<s%> the <S%H5029>prophet,<s%> and <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> the <S%H1247>son<s%> of <S%H5714>Iddo,<s%> <S%H5013>prophesied<s%> <S%H5922>to<s%> the <S%H3062>Jews<s%> who were in <S%H3061>Judah<s%> and <S%H3390>Jerusalem;<s%> in the <S%H8036>name<s%> of the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H3479>Israel<s%> they prophesied to <S%H5922>them.<s%>

<S%H116>Then<s%> rose <S%H6966>up<s%> <S%H2217>Zerubbabel<s%> the <S%H1247>son<s%> of <S%H7598>Shealtiel,<s%> and <S%H3443>Jeshua<s%> the <S%H1247>son<s%> of <S%H3136>Jozadak,<s%> and <S%H8271>began<s%> to <S%H1124>build<s%> the <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> which is at <S%H3390>Jerusalem;<s%> and with <S%H5974>them<s%> were the <S%H5029>prophets<s%> of <S%H426>God,<s%> helping <S%H5583>them.<s%>

At the same <S%H2166>time<s%> <S%H858>came<s%> to them <S%H6347>Tattenai,<s%> the governor <S%H5675>beyond<s%> the <S%H5103>River,<s%> and <S%H8370>Shetharbozenai,<s%> and their <S%H3675>companions,<s%> and <S%H560>said<s%> <S%H3652>thus<s%> to <S%H5922>them,<s%> <S%H4479>"Who<s%> gave you a <S%H7761>decree<s%> to <S%H1124>build<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H1005>house,<s%> and to <S%H3635>finish<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H846>wall?<s%>"

<S%H116>Then<s%> we <S%H560>told<s%> them in this <S%H3660>way,<s%> <S%H4479>what<s%> the <S%H8036>names<s%> of the <S%H1400>men<s%> <S%H581>were<s%> who were <S%H1124>making<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H1147>building.<s%>

But the <S%H5870>eye<s%> of their <S%H426>God<s%> <S%H1934>was<s%> <S%H5922>on<s%> the <S%H7868>elders<s%> of the <S%H3062>Jews,<s%> and they did <S%H3809>not<s%> <S%H989>make<s%> <S%H1994>them<s%> <S%H989>cease,<s%> <S%H5705>until<s%> the <S%H2941>matter<s%> should <S%H1946>come<s%> to <S%H1868>Darius,<s%> and <S%H116>then<s%> <S%H8421>answer<s%> should be returned by <S%H5407>letter<s%> <S%H5922>concerning<s%> <S%H1836>it.<s%>

The <S%H6573>copy<s%> of the <S%H104>letter<s%> that <S%H6347>Tattenai,<s%> the governor <S%H5675>beyond<s%> the <S%H5103>River,<s%> and <S%H8370>Shetharbozenai,<s%> and his <S%H3675>companions<s%> the <S%H671>Apharsachites,<s%> who were <S%H5675>beyond<s%> the <S%H5103>River,<s%> <S%H7972>sent<s%> <S%H5922>to<s%> <S%H1868>Darius<s%> the <S%H4430>king;<s%>

they <S%H7972>sent<s%> a <S%H6600>letter<s%> <S%H5922>to<s%> <S%H1459>him,<s%> in which was <S%H3790>written<s%> <S%H1836>thus:<s%> To <S%H1868>Darius<s%> the <S%H4430>king,<s%> <S%H3606>all<s%> <S%H8001>peace.<s%>

Be it <S%H1934>known<s%> to the <S%H4430>king,<s%> that we <S%H236>went<s%> into the <S%H4083>province<s%> of <S%H3061>Judah,<s%> to the <S%H1005>house<s%> of the <S%H7229>great<s%> <S%H426>God,<s%> which is <S%H1124>built<s%> with <S%H1560>great<s%> <S%H69>stones,<s%> and <S%H636>timber<s%> is <S%H7761>laid<s%> in the <S%H3797>walls;<s%> and <S%H1791>this<s%> <S%H5673>work<s%> <S%H5648>goes<s%> on with <S%H5648>diligence<s%> and <S%H6744>prospers<s%> in their <S%H3028>hands.<s%>

<S%H116>Then<s%> we <S%H7593>asked<s%> <S%H479>those<s%> <S%H7868>elders,<s%> and <S%H560>said<s%> to them <S%H3660>thus,<s%> <S%H4479>"Who<s%> gave you a <S%H7761>decree<s%> to <S%H1124>build<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H1005>house,<s%> and to <S%H3635>finish<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H846>wall?<s%>"

We <S%H7593>asked<s%> them their <S%H8036>names<s%> <S%H638>also,<s%> to <S%H3046>inform<s%> you that we might <S%H3790>write<s%> the <S%H8036>names<s%> of the <S%H1400>men<s%> who were at their <S%H7217>head.<s%>

<S%H3660>Thus<s%> they <S%H8421>returned<s%> us <S%H6600>answer,<s%> <S%H560>saying,<s%> <S%H586>"We<s%> <S%H1994>are<s%> the <S%H5649>servants<s%> of the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven<s%> and <S%H772>earth,<s%> and are <S%H1124>building<s%> the <S%H1005>house<s%> that <S%H1934>was<s%> <S%H1124>built<s%> <S%H1836>these<s%> <S%H7690>many<s%> <S%H8140>years<s%> <S%H6928>ago,<s%> which a <S%H7229>great<s%> <S%H4430>king<s%> of <S%H3479>Israel<s%> <S%H1124>built<s%> and <S%H3635>finished.<s%>

<S%H3861>But<s%> <S%H4481>after<s%> that our <S%H2>fathers<s%> had <S%H7265>provoked<s%> the <S%H426>God<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven<s%> to <S%H7265>wrath,<s%> he <S%H3052>gave<s%> <S%H1994>them<s%> into the <S%H3028>hand<s%> of <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4430>king<s%> of <S%H895>Babylon,<s%> the <S%H3679>Chaldean,<s%> who <S%H5642>destroyed<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H1005>house,<s%> and <S%H1541>carried<s%> the <S%H5972>people<s%> <S%H1541>away<s%> into <S%H895>Babylon.<s%>

<S%H1297>But<s%> in the <S%H2298>first<s%> <S%H8140>year<s%> of <S%H3567>Cyrus<s%> <S%H4430>king<s%> of <S%H895>Babylon,<s%> <S%H3567>Cyrus<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H7761>made<s%> a <S%H2942>decree<s%> to <S%H1124>build<s%> <S%H1836>this<s%> <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God.<s%>

The <S%H1722>gold<s%> and <S%H3702>silver<s%> <S%H3984>vessels<s%> <S%H638>also<s%> <S%H1768>of<s%> the <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God,<s%> which <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H5312>took<s%> out <S%H4481>of<s%> the <S%H1965>temple<s%> that was in <S%H3390>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H2987>brought<s%> into the <S%H1965>temple<s%> of <S%H895>Babylon,<s%> <S%H1994>those<s%> <S%H3567>Cyrus<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> took out <S%H4481>of<s%> the <S%H1965>temple<s%> <S%H4481>of<s%> <S%H895>Babylon,<s%> and they were <S%H3052>delivered<s%> to one whose <S%H8036>name<s%> was <S%H8340>Sheshbazzar,<s%> whom he had <S%H7761>made<s%> <S%H6347>governor;<s%>

and he <S%H560>said<s%> to <S%H5376>him,<s%> 'Take <S%H412>these<s%> <S%H3984>vessels,<s%> <S%H236>go,<s%> <S%H1994>put<s%> <S%H1994>them<s%> in the <S%H1965>temple<s%> that is in <S%H3390>Jerusalem,<s%> and let the <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> be <S%H1124>built<s%> <S%H5922>in<s%> its <S%H870>place.<s%>'

<S%H116>Then<s%> the <S%H1791>same<s%> <S%H8340>Sheshbazzar<s%> <S%H858>came,<s%> and <S%H3052>laid<s%> the <S%H787>foundations<s%> of the <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> which is in <S%H3390>Jerusalem:<s%> and <S%H4481>since<s%> that <S%H116>time<s%> even <S%H5705>until<s%> <S%H3705>now<s%> has it been in <S%H1124>building,<s%> and yet it is <S%H3809>not<s%> <S%H8000>completed.<s%>

<S%H3705>Now<s%> <S%H2006>therefore,<s%> if it seem <S%H2869>good<s%> <S%H5922>to<s%> the <S%H4430>king,<s%> let a <S%H1240>search<s%> be made in the <S%H4430>king<s%>'s <S%H1596>treasure<s%> <S%H1005>house,<s%> which is <S%H8536>there<s%> at <S%H895>Babylon,<s%> <S%H2006>whether<s%> it <S%H383>be<s%> <S%H2942>so,<s%> that a decree was <S%H7761>made<s%> <S%H4481>of<s%> <S%H3567>Cyrus<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> to <S%H1124>build<s%> <S%H1791>this<s%> <S%H1005>house<s%> of <S%H426>God<s%> at <S%H3390>Jerusalem;<s%> and let the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H7972>send<s%> his <S%H7470>pleasure<s%> to us <S%H5922>concerning<s%> this <S%H1836>matter.<s%>"
